verse.gurmukhi: Gir hrxwKs dYq dy klir kvlu Bgqu pRihlwdu[
verse.unicode: ਘਰਿ ਹਰਣਾਖਸ ਦੈਤ ਦੇ ਕਲਰਿ ਕਵਲੁ ਭਗਤੁ ਪ੍ਰਹਿਲਾਦੁ।

en.bdb: Prahlad, the saint, was born in the house of demon (king) Haranakhas like a lotus is born in the alkaline (barren) land.

transliteration.english: ghar haranaakhas dhait dhe kalar kaval bhagat prahilaadhu|
transliteration.hindi: घरि हरणाखस दैत दे कलरि कवलु भगतु प्रहिलादु।
transliteration.en: ghar haranaakhas dhait dhe kalar kaval bhagat prahilaadhu|
transliteration.hi: घरि हरणाखस दैत दे कलरि कवलु भगतु प्रहिलादु।
transliteration.ipa: Gʰər hərəɳɑkʰəs d̪æt̪ d̪e kələr kəʋəl ɓəGət̪ pɹəhɪlɑd̪ʊ.
transliteration.ur: گھر هرݨاکھس دَےت دے کلر کول بھگت پرهلاد۔

verse.gurmukhi: pVHn pTwieAw cwtswl pWDy iciq hoAw Aihlwdu[
verse.unicode: ਪੜ੍ਹਨ ਪਠਾਇਆ ਚਾਟਸਾਲ ਪਾਂਧੇ ਚਿਤਿ ਹੋਆ ਅਹਿਲਾਦੁ।

en.bdb: When he was sent to seminary, the brahmin purohit became elated (because the king’s son was now his disciple).

transliteration.english: paRhan paThaiaa chaaTasaal paa(n)dhe chit hoaa ahilaadhu|
transliteration.hindi: पड़्हन पठाइआ चाटसाल पाँधे चिति होआ अहिलादु।
transliteration.en: paRhan paThaiaa chaaTasaal paa(n)dhe chit hoaa ahilaadhu|
transliteration.hi: पड़्हन पठाइआ चाटसाल पाँधे चिति होआ अहिलादु।
transliteration.ipa: pəɽʰən pəʈʰɑɪɑ t͡ʃɑʈəsɑl pɑⁿət̪e t͡ʃɪt̪ hɔəɑ əhɪlɑd̪ʊ.
transliteration.ur: پڑھن پٹھااآ چاٹسال پاںدھے چت هوآ اهِلاد۔

verse.gurmukhi: ismrY mn ivic rwm nwm gwvY sbdu Anwhdu nwdu[
verse.unicode: ਸਿਮਰੈ ਮਨ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਾਮ ਨਾਮ ਗਾਵੈ ਸਬਦੁ ਅਨਾਹਦੁ ਨਾਦੁ।

en.bdb: Prahlad would remember the name of Ram in his heart and outwardly also he would eulogise the Lord.

transliteration.english: simarai man vich raam naam gaavai sabadh anaahadh naadhu|
transliteration.hindi: सिमरै मन विचि राम नाम गावै सबदु अनाहदु नादु।
transliteration.en: simarai man vich raam naam gaavai sabadh anaahadh naadhu|
transliteration.hi: सिमरै मन विचि राम नाम गावै सबदु अनाहदु नादु।
transliteration.ipa: sɪməræ mən ʋɪt͡ʃ rɑm nɑm Gɑʋæ səbəd̪ ənɑhəd̪ nɑd̪ʊ.
transliteration.ur: سِمرَے من وچ رام نام گاوَے سبد اناهد ناد۔

verse.gurmukhi: Bgiq krin sB cwtVY pWDy hoie rhy ivsmwdu[
verse.unicode: ਭਗਤਿ ਕਰਨਿ ਸਭ ਚਾਟੜੈ ਪਾਂਧੇ ਹੋਇ ਰਹੇ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ।

en.bdb: Now all the disciples became devotees of Lord, which was an awful and embarrassing situation for all the teachers.

transliteration.english: bhagat karan sabh chaaTaRai paa(n)dhe hoi rahe visamaadhu|
transliteration.hindi: भगति करनि सभ चाटड़ै पाँधे होइ रहे विसमादु।
transliteration.en: bhagat karan sabh chaaTaRai paa(n)dhe hoi rahe visamaadhu|
transliteration.hi: भगति करनि सभ चाटड़ै पाँधे होइ रहे विसमादु।
transliteration.ipa: ɓəGət̪ kərən səɓ t͡ʃɑʈəɽæ pɑⁿət̪e hɔeɪ rəhe ʋɪsəmɑd̪ʊ.
transliteration.ur: بھگت کرن سبھ چاٹڑَے پاںدھے هوا رهے وسماد۔

verse.gurmukhi: rwjy pwis rUAwieAw doKI dYiq vDwieAw vwdu[
verse.unicode: ਰਾਜੇ ਪਾਸਿ ਰੂਆਇਆ ਦੋਖੀ ਦੈਤਿ ਵਧਾਇਆ ਵਾਦੁ।

en.bdb: The priest (teacher) reported or complained to the king (that O king your son has become devotee of God).

transliteration.english: raaje paas rooaaiaa dhokhee dhait vadhaiaa vaadhu|
transliteration.hindi: राजे पासि रूआइआ दोखी दैति वधाइआ वादु।
transliteration.en: raaje paas rooaaiaa dhokhee dhait vadhaiaa vaadhu|
transliteration.hi: राजे पासि रूआइआ दोखी दैति वधाइआ वादु।
transliteration.ipa: rɑd͡ʒe pɑs ruəɑɪɑ d̪ɔkʰi d̪æt̪ ʋət̪ɑɪɑ ʋɑd̪ʊ.
transliteration.ur: راجے پاس رُوآایا دوکھیِ دَےت ودھاایا واد۔

verse.gurmukhi: jl AgnI ivic GiqAw jlY n fubY gur prswid[
verse.unicode: ਜਲ ਅਗਨੀ ਵਿਚਿ ਘਤਿਆ ਜਲੈ ਨ ਡੁਬੈ ਗੁਰ ਪਰਸਾਦਿ।

en.bdb: The malevolent demon picked up the quarrel. Prahlad was thrown into fire and water but with the grace of Guru (the Lord) neither he was burnt nor drowned.

transliteration.english: jal aganee vich ghatiaa jalai na ddubai gur parasaadh|
transliteration.hindi: जल अगनी विचि घतिआ जलै न डुबै गुर परसादि।
transliteration.en: jal aganee vich ghatiaa jalai na ddubai gur parasaadh|
transliteration.hi: जल अगनी विचि घतिआ जलै न डुबै गुर परसादि।
transliteration.ipa: d͡ʒəl əGəni ʋɪt͡ʃ Gʰət̪ɪəɑ d͡ʒəlæ nə ɖʊbæ Gʊr pərəsɑd̪ɪ.
transliteration.ur: جل اگنیِ وچ گھتِآ جلَے ن ڈُبَے گُر پرساد۔

verse.gurmukhi: kiF KVgu sid puiCAw kauxu su qyrw hY ausqwdu[
verse.unicode: ਕਢਿ ਖੜਗੁ ਸਦਿ ਪੁਛਿਆ ਕਉਣੁ ਸੁ ਤੇਰਾ ਹੈ ਉਸਤਾਦੁ।

en.bdb: Angered as he was, Hiranyaksyapu took out his double-edged sword and asked Prahlad who his Guru (Lord) was.

transliteration.english: kadd khaRag sadh puchhiaa kaunu su teraa hai usataadhu|
transliteration.hindi: कढि खड़गु सदि पुछिआ कउणु सु तेरा है उसतादु।
transliteration.en: kadd khaRag sadh puchhiaa kaunu su teraa hai usataadhu|
transliteration.hi: कढि खड़गु सदि पुछिआ कउणु सु तेरा है उसतादु।
transliteration.ipa: kəʈə̀ kʰəɽəG səd̪ pʊɕɪəɑ koʊɳ s t̪erɑ hæ oʊsət̪ɑd̪ʊ.
transliteration.ur: کڈھ کھڑگ سدِ پُچھآ کاݨ سُ تےرا هَے اُستاد۔

verse.gurmukhi: QMmHü pwiV prgitAw nrisMG rUp AnUp Anwid[
verse.unicode: ਥੰਮ੍ਹੁ ਪਾੜਿ ਪਰਗਟਿਆ ਨਰਸਿੰਘ ਰੂਪ ਅਨੂਪ ਅਨਾਦਿ।

en.bdb: At the same moment Lord God in the form of man-lion came out of pillar. His form was grand and majestic.

transliteration.english: tha(n)mh paaR paragaTiaa narasi(n)gh roop anoop anaadh|
transliteration.hindi: थंम्हु पाड़ि परगटिआ नरसिंघ रूप अनूप अनादि।
transliteration.en: tha(n)mh paaR paragaTiaa narasi(n)gh roop anoop anaadh|
transliteration.hi: थंम्हु पाड़ि परगटिआ नरसिंघ रूप अनूप अनादि।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ʰəŋmʰ pɑɽ pərəGəʈɪəɑ nərəsɪŋGʰə̀ rup ənup ənɑd̪ɪ.
transliteration.ur: تھںمھü پاڑ پرگٹآ نرسںگھ رُوپ انُوپ اناد۔

verse.gurmukhi: bymuK pkiV pCwiVAnu sMq shweI Awid jugwid[
verse.unicode: ਬੇਮੁਖ ਪਕੜਿ ਪਛਾੜਿਅਨੁ ਸੰਤ ਸਹਾਈ ਆਦਿ ਜੁਗਾਦਿ।

en.bdb: That wicked demon was thrown down and killed and thus it was proved that the Lord is kind to devotees since the time immemorial.

transliteration.english: bemukh pakaR pachhaaRian sa(n)t sahaiee aadh jugaadh|
transliteration.hindi: बेमुख पकड़ि पछाड़िअनु संत सहाई आदि जुगादि।
transliteration.en: bemukh pakaR pachhaaRian sa(n)t sahaiee aadh jugaadh|
transliteration.hi: बेमुख पकड़ि पछाड़िअनु संत सहाई आदि जुगादि।
transliteration.ipa: bemʊkʰ pəkəɽ pəɕɑɽɪən səŋt̪ səhɑei əɑd̪ d͡ʒʊGɑd̪ɪ.
transliteration.ur: بےمکھ پکڑ پچھاڑان سںت سهاای آد جُگاد۔

en.bdb: Seeing this Brahma and other gods started eulogising the Lord.
